body_content.explanation: a person who is learning at a college or university:
examples: a graduate/postgraduate student (= one who has completed a first degree)
a student teacher/nurse/doctor (= a person training to become a teacher, nurse, etc.)
He was a student at the University of Chicago.

body_content.explanation: someone who is learning at a school:
examples: Teachers use a variety of materials to inspire their students.
Students are not allowed to bring mobile phones in to the test.
The school has 24 students in kindergarten.

body_content.explanation: If someone is a student of a particular subject, they know about it and are interested in it:
examples: As a nurse, you have to be a student of (= to know and learn about) human nature.
